title: Mr. Scoopage
description:
Two passions: Privacy while shitting and this Station Nightclub Fire feature on CBS over the weekend have Dave fired up (00:04:28). Steven Cheah says he's the only Mini-Golfer at Barstool Sports with hardware (00:25:03). Kirk is having a tough time dealing with the fact he has to criticize Bruce Springsteen (00:28:25). Mike Silver resigns from the NFL Network and releases a story for Bally Sports on Houston Texansâ€™ chairman and CEO Cal McNair calling COVID-19 the "China Virus" (00:48:27). Tom Brady's hosts a media roundtable with some of the best in the business including "MR. SCOOPAGE" (00:56:38). Jim Caviezel goes on a bizarre rant at a Qanon Conference & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
